pr_title: [HUDI-1197] Fix import issue that fails scala 2.12 build

timeline.message: [HUDI-1197] Fix import issue that fails scala 2.12 build

timeline.bodyText: In general we should have a practice of not adding ".*" or "._" unless more than 3 or 4 entities are imported from same package.
timeline.author: nsivabalan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -20,8 +20,8 @@ package org.apache.hudi
 import org.apache.hudi.DataSourceWriteOptions._
 import org.apache.hudi.common.config.TypedProperties
 
-import scala.collection.JavaConversions._
-import scala.collection.JavaConverters._
+import scala.collection.JavaConversions.mapAsJavaMap
